AAA Fuel Gauge data may be used on a daily basis by news media Web sites, but should include attribution to AAA, the display of AAA's logo and a link to www.aaa.com. AAA's logo can be found in the "About AAA" section of the AAA NewsRoom. AAA's Daily Fuel Gauge Report is the most comprehensive retail gasoline survey available. Everyday over 60,000 self-serve stations are surveyed. © Copyright 2001, Oil Price Information Service
